page.title: 02ATTITUDES TO THE VILLAGE
page.content: A questionnaire was sent out to find out what people's attitudes were about the village.The majority of people said that they don't like all the new building taking place.Nearly everyone thought that the traffic should go past the village and not through it.The opinion was very much divided about people moving into the village. Everyone thought that the village will be much bigger and a lot of people said they wouldn't like it.All the people we asked said that we need more shops and a leisure centre with a swimming pool.Children had various other ideas on what to have such as a B.M.X.track,an arcade,a properly run youth club and a roller skating rink. The vast majority we asked said they minded all the building taking place because it was spoiling the surrounding countryside.
